H0.text: Raphanus Sativus is the Latin name of what vegetable, which has varieties including Cherry Belle, Sicily Giant and Daikon. Turnip

H1.text: Raphanus Sativus is the Latin name of what vegetable, which has varieties including Cherry Belle, Sicily Giant and Daikon. Beetroot

H2.text: Raphanus Sativus is the Latin name of what vegetable, which has varieties including Cherry Belle, Sicily Giant and Daikon. Parsnip

H3.text: Raphanus Sativus is the Latin name of what vegetable, which has varieties including Cherry Belle, Sicily Giant and Daikon. Radish

A4.text: The radish (Raphanus sativus) is a flowering plant in the mustard family, Brassicaceae.

A5.text: Sicily Giant is a large heirloom variety from Sicily.
